name: Gradius Clone (sjoerdev)
description:
This is a small game i made in a weekend for a school assignment a long time ago. It is a rough clone of the game gradius with some alterations in gameplay mechanics.

The game is open source and it is programmed in C#, but keep in mind that the code is not so great because it was made in just a weekend.

I claim no ownership of any of the assets or sound effects used. All ownership goes to Konami.

Full source code of the game can be found here: https://github.com/sjoerdev/gradius-clone

Controlls: 

- Move ship or change menu selection: "WASD" or "Arrows"

- Select menu option: "Enter"

- Shoot: "Space"
